images.copyright: Cherry trees in full bloom near the Imperial Palace with Tokyo Tower in the background, Tokyo, Japan (© Jon Arnold/Danita Delimont)
images.title: Spring blossoms in Tokyo
images.caption: Cherry blossom season in Tokyo
images.desc: Each spring, folks across Japan observe 'hanami,' a treasured tradition of viewing nature's breathtaking display of cherry blossoms. Japanese cherry trees, known as 'sakura,' reach full bloom in March in the south of the country. Our homepage picture shows cherry blossoms cascading over the moats which surround the Imperial Palace in Tokyo.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
